title: The saints anchor-hold, in all storms and tempests preached in sundry sermons, and published for the support and comfort of Gods people, in all times of tryal / by John Davenport ...
author: Davenport, John, 1597-1670.
publisher: Printed by W.L. for Geo. Hurlock, and are to be sold at his shop ...,
notes: The preface "To the Christian Reader" signed: William Hooke [and] Joseph Caryl.
Reproduction of original in British Library.
